channel.title: 3 Questions
channel.description:
Question One : I'm moving the home to Entrana but I'm not too sure if you can delete nearly everything there.
Question Two : When I was testing out my drop rates on General Graador, I never got a drop I set the drop rate to a massively high number and I still didn't get a drop out of 100 kills, is it bugged or have I just messed up?
Question Three : I want to add commands that have a certain spawn thing i.e. Vengeance Runes, Super Potions, Extreme Potions, Overloads ect.. I also want them to require an amount of money say 90K for 10K Vengeance runes.
Thanks, -MotionX

item.title: 3 Questions
item.dc:creator: @MotionX MotionX
item.description:
@MotionX wrote:

Oh yeah sorry I forgot to mention that the Source and Client is InsidiaX’s. (James and Faris) {Sorry if I got the names wrong.}

Thanks, -MotionX

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Questions
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:2, topic:441124”]You’re using pi 508 right?
Because I think drops are handled in npchandler >_>[/quote]
PI is a 317 loading 474 by default, not 508. Also, take the asking for rep out of your signature.

@OP

  1. I’ve seen it done, don’t know how
  2. Yes, drops are probally bugged
  3. Look for a tutorial on adding basic commands, or use the ::item command as a base to make it.

Read full topic
